Blog.post: hmmMmm.. it's been a l0ng time since i lax update huh~ hmmmmm past few days had quite a no. of test ehx, but den was postponed n postponed.. haha.. tml g0t chem spa, quite sianx arhx.. smm0re g0t astr0 meeting.. sat no band !! hahaha~~ but den g0t maths make up tuiti0n~~ abit sianx dia0'x gan jue rite.. qi li xiang sup3r nice~ been listenin 2 it since tt dae~ can memorize part 0f e lyrics le.. hehe.. even faster den ani 0ther examinabl3 subjects.. haha.. t0dae had PE, was slackin time as usual.. hmMm.. nth much new in sch.. stil e same, lect lect lect, tutorial n more~ t0dae watched jen, vicki, letti, david n ee wei plae soccer.. ee wei claimed tt he doesnt noe la.. den plae liao like sup3r pr0 lik3 tt.. waHx.. smm0re g0t fak3 actns 0ne lehx.. diAn da0 lia0x.. haha.. n0 lar, kiddin kiddin~ d0n qu0t3 me arHx ! i tink he v humbl3 lehx.. he n0es quit3 al0t 0f stuff but d3n wen asK him 2 d0/ sh0w rite, d3n h3 saes he d0esn't n0e~ hmMmm.. wAH ! t0dae maths tut0rial ganna sab0h3d ! susan la.. aiy0h.. all al0ng mi ish lax min d0 maths tut0rial one marhz.. den v0lunt33r mi 2 d0 e p0y0.. smm0re 13 questns lehx ! wan mi lif3 arh !! havent seen j0 n yanru 4 quit3 smtime lehx.. cuz tuiti0n cancell3d arh.. Oh.. den der's st gab's c0ncert~ 0n thurs. tis c0min.. g0in wif xian hui.. n0t sur3 if jin yen d0in lehx.. $12 ehx ! if n0t f0r tt zac arh, i w0nt g0.. st gab's guys aint r33li all tt fantastic la.. aiyah.. tj g0t tis guy frm china super cute ehx~ 0nli c him durin9 phys less0ns.. s0 i guess h3 tks doubl3 maths, ec0ns n phys ! hmmMmm.. dian da0 lia0x.. hehehe... waitin 4 sun yanzi's cd 2 c0me 0ut lehx.. alm0x a yr le.. anticipatin ~~ heeeex.. pr0m0's jus like 8 weeks away ehx !! geex... less den 2 mths~~ t0tally shitified n dead.. but den i cant wait 4 it 2 b over den can g0 change hp.. hee.. l00kin f0rward yeah ~~.. n my sh0es.. either e dada 0r e nike dunk.. and 0s0 mayb a adidas bag.. e sup3r big tt kinda.. i tink wad i nid ish a cart0n b0x.. l0lx.. l0st al0t of stuff in sch ehx.. file la.. ( but managed 2 find it bac), erasers, rulers, ws.. etc.. aiy0h.. p0ck3t empty empty le arh... sch f00d v sianx lia0x.. n0wadays liketa eat pa0 mian.. cup n00dles ! g0nna b 0n a diet ehx.. but d3n jus cant resist f00d lehx~~ esp in tJ.. hmmMmm.. muz plan properly lia0x.. i mean diet wise as well as rev time table.. quit3 a l0t 2 c0v3r arhx..

歌曲名称：七里香 歌手：周杰伦 作词：方文山 作曲：周杰伦 窗外的麻雀 在电线杆上多嘴 妳说这一句 很有夏天的感觉 手中的铅笔 在纸上来来回回 我用几行字形容妳是我的谁 秋刀鱼 的滋味 猫跟妳都想了解 初恋的香味就这样被我们寻回 那温暖 的阳光 像刚摘的鲜艳草莓 你说妳舍不得吃掉这一种感觉 雨下整夜 我的爱溢出就像雨水 院子落叶 跟我的思念厚厚一迭 几句是非 也无*将我的热情冷却 妳出现在我诗的每一页 雨下整夜 我的爱溢出就像雨水 窗台蝴蝶 像诗里纷飞的美丽章节 我接着写 把永远爱妳写进诗的结尾 妳是我唯一想要的了解 那饱满 的稻穗 幸福了这个季节 而妳的脸颊像田里熟透的蕃茄 妳突然 对我说 七里香的名字很美 我此刻却只想亲吻妳倔强的嘴 so nice~~ e lyrics like doesnt apply 2 mi lar, but den e feelin of e s0ng n e lyrics sup3r 配 ~ den u get tt kinda feelin~ touchin sia ~ hmmMmm.. shud i buy e cd ?

waH.. t0dae mi z0 b0 againx l3hx.. earli m0rn wak3 up lik3 5/6 tim3s 0nli to noe tt it's stil earli in e morn ard 7am. smmore stil had my drumsticks in my hands.. haha, played in e drums in my dreams mayb? haha.. den woke up @ 8 lor.. wanted 2 haf a simple breakfax den d0 phys prac.. but den mi daddy says he wanna buy breakfax for mi, den okie lar, had hotcake + harshbrown =) i'm a lucki pig hor.. haha.. smmore morn rainin.. after breakfax, bath, den g0 sch lia0x.. g0t stupid principal t0k la.. jus repeated e smting tt was said like mths ag0.. they've g0t fantastic mem0ry sia~ repeat each time they c par3nt.. wen reach sch was stil rainin, saw yun hui, she got sc duty, shelterin ppl.. vicki oso! she uhser mi 2 lt.. haha.. den saw jennifer oso.. lax nite she told mi like quite al0t la.. tt she wasnt reeli happy.. hmmm, to jen, i'm here oki3.. den i came h0me, after jus 40 mins in sch 4 e usel3ss tok.. in less den an hour, i was on e way to hougang liaox.. went popular, buy pens, stars.. alot la.. den 0s0 went to buy pants.. oh Oh, lunch ! aiyah..f00d v impt.. NTUC 0s0.. aniwae, jus buy buy and buy from 1 - 440 lar.. den mi br0 came outa his tuition den came h0me.. den i zZzz.. haha.. wad gd life i have rite? d0n envy lar, e dire consequences will come in time.. hahha.. den realise mi cousins in mi hse ! arhX ! den entertain dem all e wae til n0w lar.. haha.. s0 n0w i'm havin supp3r n d0in pW n bl0ggin9 n chatin n list3nin 2 jaY.. multitask h0r.. haix.. s0 much 2 d0 lehx, but den i d0n0 where 2 start.. hmmMmm.. i muz fa fen tu qiang 4 pr0m0s lia0x.. i 0nli nid 4Bs enuff le.. hahaha.. okie la, bl0g 0ther day.. gtg n typ3 mins le.. it's almox 1..

wah.. t0dae had e blood donation driv3 ting.. mi class lik3 6 went for e blood donation la.. smmore purposely pon phys.. haha.. if i knew i'd haf went too.. lolx.. actualli i don mind goin 2 donate blood arhx, but den i din get mi mommy 2 sign e ting lorx.. aiyah~~ har.. yun hui went la.. but den was rejected str in e face.. haha.. s0 sad... hey, not meant 2 b sarcastic okie ! yeah... jo is sendin mi e pic tt i took wif mai, jo n joce.. all in diff jc uniforms.. haha.. missed e time wen we had fun in hai sing lehx.. hey joce, in sp rite ! jia you k.. miss ya.. miss e times we had wen we were like sec 2 rite? heex.. memory stays on =) u rox girl.. hmmMm.. cant remem todae's lessons lehx.. was actualli quite insignificant lar.. oh, had pe ! simply hate PTs.. s0 not fun~ eeyer.. ran round e sch wif yun hui la.. e rex onli like got golda, wan tin, susan, inez, sandy, cecilia lor.. den all super fax ones.. mi slackin partners all not ard.. haha.. even letitia oso go donate blood lor.. eeeyer~~ den now suddenli der's like so much PW 2 do lor.. den all articles start poppin out.. wad e.. dotx.. wanted 2 watch mean girls lehx.. but den hor, like not alot of time lar.. cuz ish like nxt week got 4 tests ! wh0a, thnx alot huh.. haha.. after havin said so much, i muz sae hor, hero v nice !! haha.. and so is "nobody knows it but me".. it used 2 have lotsa meaning 2 mi.. now stil.. but den ish diff le~ haix.. time pasts n ppl change.. we all do grow up rite.. but wen can i grow outta tis? it's not gettin mi aniwhere.. dad's bdae was jus over n tt again had significant meaning in mi life.. 0h yah, toda3 mi CT tt shuai ge not here lor.. den one old ladi tk over e maths tutorial.. ah.. super slow.. smmore i got time 2 copi n fold stars n chit chat.. haha..

wh0a.. reeli tir3d lehx.. outta 58 hrs i 0nli like slp 7 hrs l0rx.. up 2 n0w lar.. aiya.. n0w in lectur3 stil zZzin9 arHx.. t0dae had bi0 spa.. waH !! i sm0ked up e entire results, as usual la.. but den lax nite i g0t plan lehx. hahaha... and i planned game til 1 + in e nite again.. i tink i'm courtin death.. alwax slpin so latex.. den todae is racial harm0ny day ! s0 mani ppl wear traditional cl0thin9s.. like parade sh0w like tt.. see ppl's fi9ure nia... lolx.. waH e ppl sup3r curvy lorx... hao shen cai.. aiyah.. zi bei.. haha.. yun hui la ! wear alreadi sup3r nic3 lorx.. den went 2 disturB h3r.. refus3 2 tok 2 her.. haha... smmore we sms.. but den not considered as tokin.. lolx.. todae got debate lehx.. btwn acjc n vj... wanted 2 watch but den g0tta pon band arhx.. went out leh ! wif bag lor.. but den e guilt pulled mi bac.. haha.. today xuena super high lor.. d0n0 y 0s0.. abit sia0 sia0.. my darling lar.. aiyah.. haha.. my eyelids r failin mi sia~ i tink i'm gonna slp anitime aniwhere arh.. zzz deficient.. smmore so much 2 do for pw.. spa.. maths tutorial.. phys tutorial.. chem tutorial.. music theory.. electone.. arhx.. sooo much 2 d0, so little time.. i tink i idle too much of mi time awae...hahaa... okie.. enuff 4 todae.. haf fun ~

hmMmm.. a new bl0g.. actualli had smting 0n.. den aft3r tt it disappeared.. d0n0 y 0s0.. but aniwae, yah, new bl0g.. swtiched 0ver frm xanga.. oh yah, if wanna xcess mi xanga one rite, g0.. i cant remem 0s0.. haha.. t0dae was s000 busy.. sneezed mi n0se 0ff and d0zed 0ff to g0 dreamland.. der's jus s0 much t0 d0.. i'm lik3 f33lin e stress n0w lehx.. mayb abit t00 late h0r.. d0n0 lehx.. hmmMmm see h0w lar.. haha

mariah's carey.. her0.. der's s0 much 2 e s0n9.. it's n0t 0nli e lyrics but 0s0 e mel0dy.. it's jus a alm0st p3rf3ct bl3nd~ and a her0 c0mes al0ng, w/ e strenth 2 carry 0n... w00h000 ! hmmmMMmm.. a her0 lies in u~ nic333.. lif3 is such a w0nder but smtimes it can 0s0 b such a pain ~

»»»»»»more than a little pi55ed...«««««« 0nce again, the same ting happened. T0dae during lunch, jen & letti had MD stuff & s0 was inv0lved in car washin dry run, and did n0t have time 4 lunch. t0 d0 dem e service, geck n mi went 2 buy lunch 4 dem.. b0ught burgers..den der were 4 burgers left, onli one w/out cheese.. & i s0 happened 2 remem tt jEn d0esnt tk cheese, s0 i asked geck 2 double check. s0 okie, we b0ught.. wen in class, we gave it 2 jen lar, den jen happened 2 ask, wh0 rememered tt she din like cheese & geck immediately said " me! see i so gd rite".. arHX !!! h0w pissed can i get ? 4 e rex 0f e tut0rials, i was jus pissed 0ff.. t0tally larx.. PIQUE !! arhX !! lata jen asked lar h0w c0me i like tt, den she sae sianx arh? i jus fu yan & said yah.. den she 0s0 sian dia0x lia0x.. smm0re mr chan toked to her.. smhow i jus don understand e tchrs.. it's like.. nobodi wish 2 haf tt wad.. nobodi wan tt kinda results.. e constant so called encouragement onli daunts her.. damn.. feel like she's not even given a chance to breath.. deni msged her 2 sae sry.. cuz i t0ld her tt der's a reas0n but i cant sae.. den again, wad to sae ? how to sae? how i wish i can sae, but den.. haix... den cuz she 0s0 sad marHx, den she stil gotta console me.. tt's so her.. selfless, others b4 self.. hmMmm.. my iD0l sia`` haIx.. y muz geck alwax d0 tt ? i feel s0.. s0.. haix.. wad can i d0 ?!? arHx !! save me !! oh yah, n0wadays 0s0 cl0ser 2 yun hui.. d0n0 y 0s0.. l0lx.. quite fun arHx.. din xpect 2 b s0.. cuz it's like had actualli wanted 2 n0e her betta but felt tt she din haf enuff time.. s0 i jus gave up.. n0w she's bac.. seri0usly, sch is 0nli bout frens.. if it had n0t been 4 these ppl like jen, yun hui, n smtimes geck, i'd b in mj.. where all my frens are.. where yanru, jo, lily, shi hui, kai ming, yuan qing, charlene, kok yong, guan xun, denzil.. where they all are. haixx.. arHx !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! s0 shitified.. e w0rld is such a complicated place, it's a right choice 2 not trust n sae e truth.. -ve emotions.. haix, t0tallly true.. pretendious me.. i nid my mask, i nid my paintbrush.. 4 e truth is not 2 b told & be hurt.

»»»»»»a little pi55ed...«««««« t0dae alittle pissed.. will b sorta weird wen u hear wad i'm gonna sae, because e person i'm pissed wif isnt susan who had alwax pang seh us, it aint yee ee, who ish alwax so loud, and it aint ani of e guys because seldom tok.. & n0t even gu0 wei wh0 did e para 2 0f e pW wr0ngli.. it's actualli g3ck.. haix.. cuz t0dae she kept like tia0 p0 li jian btwn mi n jen larx.. n0t tt der's anitin wr0ng wif tt larx.. but den she's like carryin it alittle t00 far.. @ e edge 0f my limit! haIx.. den it's like i was already g0nna wear jen's jacket larx.. den she purp0sely c0me snatch.. den wen jen asked wh0 was it wh0 reeli initiated wantin 2 g0 jen's hse, she claimed tt it's her !! arHx !!! i d0n0 lar.. tt m0ment i jus felt s0 pissed n i jus blasted myself wif music.. wad m0re can i sae ? firx time s0 pissed 0ff ehx.. i mean seriously pissed as in pissed.. pique.. PIQUE !! [a feeling of anger and annoyance, especially caused by damage to your feeling of pride in yourself frm cambridge dictionary online..] i jus feel so.. arHx !! haiYa.. smtings in life jus aint wad u wan n how u wan it 2 b.. i jus leave it up 2 fate larx.. den again, wh0 can i tel? e m0re i type, e w0rse i feel.. listenin 2 sad s0ngs n0w... sup3r nice ehx ! den again, onli make mi m0re sad cuz 0f ??? How Do I Live by Trisha Yearwood How do I get through one night without you If I had to live without you What kind of life would that be Oh I, I need you in my arms Need you to hold You're my world, my heart, my soul If you ever leave Baby, you would take away everything good in my life (Chorus) And tell me now How do I live without you I want to know How do I breathe without you If you ever go How do I ever, ever survive, How do I How do I Oh how do I live Without you, there'd be no sun in my sky There would be no love in my life There would be no world left for me And I , Baby I don't know what I would do I'd be lost if I lost you If you ever leave Baby you'd take away everything real in my life (Chorus) Please tell me baby How would I go on If you ever leave Baby you would take away everything Need you with me Baby, don't you know that your everything good in my life And tell me now How do I live without you I want to know How do I breathe without you If you ever go How do I ever, ever, survive How do I How do I Oh how do I live How do I live Without you baby an0ther 0ne, 0s0 v nice.. g0t sax smm0re.. haix, e m0re i hear, e sadder i bc0me.. How Could An Angel Break My Heart by Toni Braxton I heard he sang a lullaby I heard he sang it from his heart When I found out thought I would die Because that lullaby was mine I heard he sealed it with a kiss He gently kissed her cherry lips I found that so hard to believe Because his kiss belonged to me How could an angel break my heart Why didn't he catch my falling star I wish I didn't wish so hard Maybe I wished our love apart How could an angel break my heart mmm..mm I heard her face was white as rain (your face is white as rain) Soft as a rose that blooms in May (soft as a rose in May) He keeps her picture in a frame (I keep your picture) And when he sleeps he calls her name... (I only call out your name) I wonder if she makes him smile (she doesn't make me smile) The way he used to smile at me (I only smile at you) I hope she doesn't make him laugh (she doesn't make me laugh) Because his laugh belongs to me (my laugh belongs to you) How could an angel break my heart (you are my heart) Why didn't he catch my falling star (I'll catch your star) I wish I didn't wish so hard (don't wish so hard) Maybe I wish our love apart (love falls apart) How could an angel break my heart... (your tender heart) whoa..oh...yeah Oh my soul is dying, it's crying I'm trying to understand Please help me How could an angel break my heart (I never break your heart) Why didn't he catch my falling star (I catch your falling star) I wish I didn't wish so hard (you never wish too hard Maybe I wished our love apart (we're not apart) How could an angel break my heart... what.. oooh.... haIx... s0 sad, s0 pissed, s0 dissapointed, s0 upset, s0 stressed up, s0 unhappy, s0 w0rryin.. Haix.. all -ve em0tions jus c0me 2 mi.. smm0re i hafta act happy again.. it used 2 b s0, and n0w stil s0.. 4 my m00d d0es affect 0ther's alth0u i'm n0t tt impt in 0ther ppl's lif3 anim0re.. feel like cryin, but no shoulders t0 lean on... feel like cryin, but my tears haf all dried up... feel like jus being hugged, but no open arms 4 mi.. feel like lookin @ e nite sky n stars, but e place is taken up.. feel like runnin away, but i noe i cant.. feel like givin up, but i noe i shudnt... feel like tellin ppl bout my misery, but der aint ani listenin ear.. feel like trustin ppl, but my instinct tells mi not to.. feel like being m0re truthful n 0pen, but t0 wh0m? f0r it 0nli hurts wen u trust.. it's betta 2 b0ttled urself up den all0w ppl 2 plant a b0mb n hurt u instead.. 0nce bitten twice shy.. haix.. feel like pennin down every single tot, but w0rds cant symb0lize feelin9s..
